special_text:
Time loop [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Remove them all after III.)[/i]
I – Create a 1/1 green Spirit creature token.
II – Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
III – Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
